creator: Gotcha Social Network
descriptionHtml:
Gotcha is a discovery app to meet new friends anywhere you like, just tap and chat then you will make new friends or even you will find amazing love. This is the best meet new friends app to start your friendship or love journey.

Download now to start to find new friends in your location or around the world! 🔥🔥

By using Gotcha as the latest chatting app, you will connect with new people from nearby your location and from various countries to be friends with.


Gotcha Best Main Features:

Your Friend is Here! 🔔
This is a special feature and new from Gotcha and there’s no other app that has this feature. Gotcha will notify you if there are any of your friends in the same area with you with cute animation. 🤭🤭

Find New Friends 🔎
Discover thousands of girls or boys near your location, you can also explore each country to find which one that suitable for you! Send them your friend request to let them know you’re interested to be friends. ❤❤

Express Yourself 🤩
You can share your photos and videos in Gotcha without limit! Your friends will see what’s the new update from you on the timeline page. 😍😍

Map & Location Feature 📌
Gotcha offers you various ways to find new people in your area, you can connect with them and start chatting to meet. 🌏🌏

Highly Secure and Protected 💪🏻
We highly protect your privacy and data. You don’t need to worry if your data is shared or leaked to the internet. Gotcha also allows you to set your privacy in the app. 🔒🔒

Download Gotcha now and you will amaze how easy to make friends online!
descriptionShort: Say hello to everyone and meet new friends nearby and around the world!

• Added social login for easier access

Update now and Enjoy Gotcha!

title: Gotcha! – Chat & Meet New People Around the World

creator: Gotcha Social Network
descriptionHtml:
Gotcha is a free chatting app with exciting features! With this app you can find people nearby and meet new people to make new friends around the world. Start with Gotcha to boost your social network!

Are you looking for new friends or do you want to chat with people around the world? If so, you have found what you are looking for. Just download Gotcha to find strangers who live nearby or other countries. You can make friends and chat them for FREE!

This is the right place to find new friends or old friends and it’s possible for you to find your love wherever and whenever you are. So, what are you waiting for?

Have you ever imagined if you can know the world from all the people you know with this app? Of course, you can know various languages, cultures, and many more. You can even exchange your exciting experiences from your country with all new friends in this app.

By using Gotcha, making friends online is super easy and convenient because this app is very protective of its users from spam, scam and etc.

So, what do you think? If you want to know that this app can help you to meet strangers and see if they are cool match for you. Say hi to them and you can talk to them through chat with your friends about your hobbies and interests, so start using Gotcha now!

Gotcha is also very secure so you don’t have to worry about your data privacy as you make friends with all of our members.

BEST FEATURES OF GOTCHA:

✔ Enjoy all features for FREE!

🔔 Get notified when there are friends who are near you.

😉 Simple sign up process to make sure everyone on Gotcha is REAL humans.

😎 Simple, clean, modern user interface.

💌 View profiles and pictures of people who interest you.

💑 Meet girls and boys around you.

💖 Find potential friends or dates nearby.

🔎 Search people who meet your criteria and get great results!

🔐 Great data security.

You shouldn’t pass the chance to get to meet strangers, meet girls, and boys that can potentially be your friends or dates.

So, what are you waiting for? Join us to find new friends today!

We hope you enjoy our app and if you’re happy with this app, please give us your best rating and review. Thank you!
descriptionShort: Gotcha is a Social Network to Meet New People nearby and around the world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Updated New UI styles!
• Added New Features!

Recommended to update to the newest version now!

title: Gotcha! – Chat & Meet New People Around the World

creator: Gotcha Social Network
descriptionHtml:
Meet new people, find new friends online, chat with strangers, and make meaningful connections with anyone you like.

Gotcha is an international and local friends discovery app that enables you to meet new friends anywhere you like. All you need to do is tap to find new friends online and use the messenger features to chat with strangers. Turn interesting conversations between two platonic friends into everlasting bonds.

This is the best app to meet new friends app and start your friendship or love journey. You can also enable the friends near me notification to get alerts when tour friends are in your area!

Download Gotcha! - Worldwide Friends Finder, Chat and Meet now to start to find new friends in your location or around the world! 🔥🔥

Meet New People All Over the World
By using Gotcha as the latest local friend finder and chatting app, you will meet new people from all over the world as well as make local friends from nearby locations.

Whether you want to make new friends globally or chat with strangers from any country, this amazing app is the best option for you.

Gotcha! - Worldwide Friends Finder, Chat and Meet Features:

Your Friend is Here! 🔔
This is a special feature and new from Gotcha and there’s no other app that has this feature. Gotcha will send you a friends near me notification if any of your friends are in the same area as you are. Enjoy instant alerts with cute animations.🤭🤭

Find New Friends Online 🔎
Discover thousands of girls or boys near your location and make local friends. You can also explore each country to find new friends online from any country! Send them your friend request to let them know you’re interested to be platonic friends with them. ❤❤

Chat With Strangers and Express Yourself 🤩
You can share your photos and videos in Gotcha without any limit! Your friends will see what’s the new update from you on the timeline page. You can also chat with strangers or your friends privately and easily.😍😍

Map & Location Feature 📌
Gotcha offers you various ways to find friends online and meet new people in your area. You can connect with local friends or international platonic friends and starting chatting with them to make meetup plans!🌏🌏

Highly Secure and Protected 💪🏻
We highly protect your privacy and data. You don’t need to worry if your data is shared or leaked to the internet while using this app. Gotcha also allows you to set your privacy in the app. 🔒🔒

Highlights of Gotcha! - Worldwide Friends Finder, Chat and Meet
• Simple and easy app to meet new people
• Make new friends easily with a secure app
• Find new friends online or rediscover your old friendships
• Chat with strangers securely and privately
• Make local friends or international platonic friends from anywhere in the world
• Make new friends and talk to them to plan meetups
• Receive instant, cute animation on friends near me notification when a friend is in your area

So, what are you waiting for? Download and use Gotcha! - Worldwide Friends Finder, Chat and Meet to make new friends today!
descriptionShort: Say hello to everyone and meet new friends nearby and around the world!

title: Gotcha! – Worldwide Friends Finder, Chat & Say Hi

creator: PT Click Digital Media
descriptionHtml:
When you're bored, why don't you download Gotcha to find friends and chat with everyone around the world!

Gotcha is a worldwide and local friends discovery app that makes your day exciting with new people wherever they are. All you need to do is to start chat with them and let's start make friends.

What you should know about Gotcha and other benefits you will get when you use this app

Features:

Journey 🌎:

See all the latest posts from your friends and all users around the world. You can have interactions, learn and get new various information from all countries.

Nice Chat Features 💬:

By using this fresh and minimalist look chat application, you can have fun with everyone and talk to them all day long.

See All Users by Countries😎:

See all users from old to new ones, and you can even see all users from various countries and start find friends from here.

Post and Share 📸:

Upload your best videos and photos and share those moments for the world to see.

Notifications 🔔:

This special feature helps provide notifications if you and your friends are in the same area. Plus, a map feature for you to find out your friend's distance and location.

Very Safe and Secure 🔒:

We are very protective of your privacy and data, so don't worry about using Gotcha as your social media app.

So, what are you waiting for? Download and use Gotcha now to make new friends worldwide!

We're so thankful and appreciate all of you for choosing and using Gotcha as your favorite app.

• New Feature: You can now use the buzz feature to share what's inside your mind about everything!

title: Gotcha: Friends Finder & Chat

creator: PT Click Digital Media
descriptionHtml:
When you're bored, why don't you download Gotcha to find friends and chat with everyone around the world!

Gotcha is a worldwide and local friends discovery app that makes your day exciting with new people wherever they are. All you need to do is to start chat with them and let's start make friends.

What you should know about Gotcha and other benefits you will get when you use this app

Features:

Journey 🌎:

See all the latest posts from your friends and all users around the world. You can have interactions, learn and get new various information from all countries.

Nice Chat Features 💬:

By using this fresh and minimalist look chat application, you can have fun with everyone and talk to them all day long.

See All Users by Countries😎:

See all users from old to new ones, and you can even see all users from various countries and start find friends from here.

Post and Share 📸:

Upload your best videos and photos and share those moments for the world to see.

Notifications 🔔:

This special feature helps provide notifications if you and your friends are in the same area. Plus, a map feature for you to find out your friend's distance and location.

Very Safe and Secure 🔒:

We are very protective of your privacy and data, so don't worry about using Gotcha as your social media app.

So, what are you waiting for? Download and use Gotcha now to make new friends worldwide!

We're so thankful and appreciate all of you for choosing and using Gotcha as your favorite app.
descriptionShort: Make new friends, start chat and share your photos or videos to the world!

• Optimized and Increased ATW performance for a better experience.
• Fixed some bugs on features.
• New Feature: You can now use the buzz feature to share what's inside your mind about everything!
